LanguageData.Nexora_AccessInterface.label: Access Interface
LanguageData.Nexora_AccessInterface.description: This interface is the interaction point between the Nexora storage network and reality. Used for withdrawing/depositing items
LanguageData.Nexora_AutoWorker.label: Auto Worker
LanguageData.Nexora_AutoWorker.description: A machine that can automatically complete work. Must be placed at the operation point of a workbench. It can only complete job lists with products. This is a soulless machine, so it struggles to produce elegant artworks. (In fact, product quality improves with higher overclocking levels)
LanguageData.Nexora_ExternalStorageConnector.label: External Storage Interface
LanguageData.Nexora_ExternalStorageConnector.descript: Connect vanilla storage buildings (like item shelves) to the Nexora storage network. This feature may have bugs; it is recommended to use Nexora's virtual storage whenever possible.
LanguageData.Nexora_CPU01a.label: Antique CPU
LanguageData.Nexora_CPU01a.description: A CPU scavenged from a garbage heap. It offers only 1/4 the work efficiency of a human. Supports only 1 device.
LanguageData.Nexora_CPU02a.label: Obsolete CPU
LanguageData.Nexora_CPU02a.description: An old CPU from many years ago, unearthed from a storage room. It offers only 0.83 the work efficiency of a human. Supports 3 devices.
LanguageData.Nexora_CPU03a.label: Low-end CPU
LanguageData.Nexora_CPU03a.description: Average performance but excellent value. Provides up to 256 ops of computing power. Supports 7 devices.
LanguageData.Nexora_CPU04a.label: Flagship CPU
LanguageData.Nexora_CPU04a.description: A flagship-level CPU from FxxkU company. Provides up to 1024 ops of computing power. Supports 10 devices.
LanguageData.Nexora_CPU05a.label: Server CPU
LanguageData.Nexora_CPU05a.description: A server CPU for data centers. Provides up to 4096 ops of computing power. Supports 15 devices.
LanguageData.Nexora_CPU06a.label: Supercomputer
LanguageData.Nexora_CPU06a.description: A supercomputer. Provides up to 16384 ops of computing power. Supports 15 devices.
LanguageData.Nexora_LocalStorage2x2a.label: Storage drive 4
LanguageData.Nexora_LocalStorage2x2a.description: A hard drive with 4 disks inserted, capable of storing 800kg of items
LanguageData.Nexora_LocalStorage2x4a.label: Storage drive 8
LanguageData.Nexora_LocalStorage2x4a.description: A hard drive with 8 disks inserted, capable of storing 1300kg of items
LanguageData.Nexora_LocalStorageBlue.label: Simple Integrated Storage
LanguageData.Nexora_LocalStorageBlue.description: A highly integrated storage device, capable of storing 5000kg of items
LanguageData.Nexora_LocalStorageGreen.label: Good Integrated Storage
LanguageData.Nexora_LocalStorageGreen.description: A highly integrated storage device, capable of storing 10000kg of items
LanguageData.Nexora_LocalStorageYellow.label: Exquisite Integrated Storage
LanguageData.Nexora_LocalStorageYellow.description: A highly integrated storage device, capable of storing 30000kg of items
LanguageData.Nexora_LocalStorageRed.label: Epic Integrated Storage
LanguageData.Nexora_LocalStorageRed.description: A highly integrated storage device, capable of storing 100000kg of items
LanguageData.Nexora_LocalStoragePurple.label: Black Hole Integrated Storage
LanguageData.Nexora_LocalStoragePurple.description: This storage contains a miniature black hole for compressing items, capable of storing NaN items
